General.Name: Darmi Bersaudara Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Darmi Bersaudara Tbk primarily engages in the trading of processed wood products in Indonesia, India, and Nepal. Its processed wood products include decking, E2E, T&G, flooring, door jamb, post beam, finger joint, and window jamb products. The company exports its products. PT Darmi Bersaudara Tbk was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Darmi Bersaudara Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Darbe Putra Makmur.
General.Address: Jl. Nginden Intan Barat V Blok C4/10, Surabaya, Indonesia, 60118
